info.title: cBioPortal web Public API [Alpha]
info.description: A web service for supplying JSON formatted data to cBioPortal clients. Please note that this API is currently in beta and subject to change.
info.version: 1.0 (beta). Backwards compatibility will be maintained (after 1.0 release)

tags.name: Server running status
tags.description: This end point does not require authentication

post.description: Calculates correlations between a genetic entity from a specific profile and another profile from the same study

parameters.name: molecularProfileIdA
parameters.description: Molecular Profile ID from the Genetic Entity referenced in the co-expression filter e.g. acc_tcga_rna_seq_v2_mrna

parameters.name: molecularProfileIdB
parameters.description: Molecular Profile ID (can be the same as molecularProfileIdA) e.g. acc_tcga_rna_seq_v2_mrna

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Threshold

post.description: Fetch gene set "genetic data" items (gene set scores) by profile Id, gene set ids and sample ids

parameters.name: geneticProfileId
parameters.description: Genetic profile ID, e.g. gbm_tcga_gsva_scores

post.description: Get the genes in a gene set that have expression correlated to the gene set scores (calculated using Spearman's correlation)

parameters.name: genesetId
parameters.description: Gene set ID, e.g. HINATA_NFKB_MATRIX.

parameters.name: geneticProfileId
parameters.description: Genetic Profile ID e.g. gbm_tcga_gsva_scores

parameters.name: correlationThreshold
parameters.description: Correlation threshold (for absolute correlation value, Spearman correlation)

parameters.name: sampleListId
parameters.description: Identifier of pre-defined sample list with samples to query, e.g. brca_tcga_all

schema.description: Fill this one if you want to specify a subset of samples: sampleIds: custom list of samples or patients to query, e.g. ["TCGA-A1-A0SD-01", "TCGA-A1-A0SE-01"]

post.description: Fetch gene sets by ID
Get gene set hierarchical organization information. I.e. how different gene sets relate to other gene sets, in a hierarchy

parameters.name: geneticProfileId
parameters.description: Genetic Profile ID e.g. gbm_tcga_gsva_scores. The final hierarchy  will only include gene sets scored in the specified profile.

parameters.name: percentile
parameters.description: Percentile (for score calculation). Which percentile to use when determining the *representative score*

parameters.name: scoreThreshold
parameters.description: Gene set score threshold (for absolute score value). Filters out gene sets where the GSVA(like) *representative score* is under this threshold.

parameters.name: pvalueThreshold
parameters.description: p-value threshold. Filters out gene sets for which the score p-value is higher than this threshold.

parameters.name: sampleListId
parameters.description: Identifier of pre-defined sample list with samples to query, e.g. brca_tcga_all

schema.description: Fill this one if you want to specify a subset of samples: sampleIds: custom list of samples or patients to query, e.g. ["TCGA-A1-A0SD-01", "TCGA-A1-A0SE-01"]

post.description: Fetch violin plot curves per categorical clinical data value, filtered by study view filter

parameters.name: categoricalAttributeId
parameters.description: Clinical Attribute ID of the categorical attribute

parameters.name: numericalAttributeId
parameters.description: Clinical Attribute ID of the numerical attribute

parameters.name: axisStart
parameters.description: Starting point of the violin plot axis, if different than smallest value

parameters.name: axisEnd
parameters.description: Ending point  of the violin plot axis, if different than largest value

parameters.name: numCurvePoints
parameters.description: Number of points in the curve

parameters.name: logScale
parameters.description: Use log scale for the numerical attribute

parameters.name: sigmaMultiplier
parameters.description: Sigma stepsize multiplier

post.description: Fetch clinical data for the Clinical Tab of Study View

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size of the result list

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number of the result list. Zero represents the first page.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search term to filter sample rows. Samples are returned with a partial match to the search term for any sample clinical attribute.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: sampleId, patientId, or the ATTR_ID to sorted by

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction of the sort

post.description: Fetch clinical data enrichments for the sample groups

parameters.name: xAxisAttributeId
parameters.description: Clinical Attribute ID of the X axis

parameters.name: xAxisBinCount
parameters.description: Number of the bins in X axis

parameters.name: xAxisStart
parameters.description: Starting point of the X axis, if different than smallest value

parameters.name: xAxisEnd
parameters.description: Starting point of the X axis, if different than largest value

parameters.name: yAxisAttributeId
parameters.description: Clinical Attribute ID of the Y axis

parameters.name: yAxisBinCount
parameters.description: Number of the bins in Y axis

parameters.name: yAxisStart
parameters.description: Starting point of the Y axis, if different than smallest value

parameters.name: yAxisEnd
parameters.description: Starting point of the Y axis, if different than largest value

parameters.name: xAxisLogScale
parameters.description: Use log scale for X axis

parameters.name: yAxisLogScale
parameters.description: Use log scale for Y axis

ClinicalDataSingleStudyFilter.description: List of patient or sample IDs and attribute IDs

StructuralVariantFilter.description: List of entrezGeneIds, structural variant queries and molecularProfileIds or sampleMolecularIdentifiers

NamespaceComparisonFilter.description: List of SampleIdentifiers, list of values and a NamespaceAttribute

MutationMultipleStudyFilter.description: List of Molecular Profile IDs or List of Molecular Profile ID / Sample ID pairs, and List of Entrez Gene IDs

MutationFilter.description: List of Sample IDs/Sample List ID and Entrez Gene IDs

MutationSpectrumFilter.description: List of Sample IDs/Sample List ID

MolecularDataFilter.description: List of Sample IDs/Sample List ID and Entrez Gene IDs

GenePanelDataFilter.description: List of Sample IDs/Sample List ID and Entrez Gene IDs

DiscreteCopyNumberFilter.description: List of Sample IDs/Sample List ID and Entrez Gene IDs

MolecularProfileFilter.description: List of Molecular Profile IDs or List of Study IDs

CoExpressionFilter.description: List of Sample IDs/Sample List ID and Entrez Gene ID/Gene set ID

MolecularDataMultipleStudyFilter.description: List of Molecular Profile ID and Sample ID pairs or List of MolecularProfile IDs and Entrez Gene IDs

GenesetDataFilterCriteria.description: Search criteria to return the values for a given set of samples and gene set items. genesetIds: The list of identifiers for the gene sets of interest, e.g. HINATA_NFKB_MATRIX. Use one of these if you want to specify a subset of samples:(1) sampleListId: Identifier of pre-defined sample list with samples to query, e.g. brca_tcga_all or (2) sampleIds: custom list of samples or patients to query, e.g. TCGA-BH-A1EO-01, TCGA-AR-A1AR-01

GenericAssayMetaFilter.description: List of Molecular Profile ID or List of Stable ID

GenericAssayFilter.description: List of Sample IDs/Sample List ID and Generic Assay IDs

GenericAssayDataMultipleStudyFilter.description: List of Molecular Profile ID and Sample ID pairs or List of MolecularProfile IDs and Generic Assay IDs

GenericAssayDataBinCountFilter.description: Generic assay data bin count filter

MolecularProfileCasesGroupAndAlterationT.description: List of groups containing sample identifiers and list of Alteration Types

ClinicalDataMultiStudyFilter.description: List of patient or sample identifiers and attribute IDs

GroupFilter.description: List of altered and unaltered Sample/Patient IDs

ClinicalAttributeCountFilter.description: List of SampleIdentifiers or Sample List ID
